Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: internal\services\task_service.go:310:43: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\services\task_service.go:9:2: import 'github.com/google/uuid' is not allowed from list 'main': Use pkg/types (uuid re-exports) (depguard)
internal\services\task_service_test.go:9:2: import 'github.com/google/uuid' is not allowed from list 'main': Use pkg/types (uuid re-exports) (depguard)
internal\events\nats_bus.go:212:48: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
